Hi Milt!  Sorry I won't see you this show but enjoy yourself.  Sedation 
cont. ed. all weekend for me.  As far as the Compton's go they've been 
a little off on Ebay recently but I'd say depending on condition 
between $300 and $500 for the set.  Later!  
Pete Klein
Ft. Lauderdale
